title: GE GCST11X1WSS Microwave Oven, 950-watt 6 Auto Cooking Settings, Kitchen Essentials for The Countertop, Dorm Room or Apartment, Child-Lock Technology 1.1 Cu. Ft, Stainless Steel
description: The GE 1.1 Cu. Ft. Capacity Countertop Microwave Oven fits easily on any kitchen counter, while providing plenty of space for all your cooking needs: from popcorn to veggies to leftovers. This 950-watt compact microwave includes a rotating interior turntable for even cooking and Instant On one-touch controls make operation quick and easy. Automatic and manual defrost options allow for maximum user control. Stainless steel and clean lines bring understated sophistication to any kitchen d�cor.
